thread.title: 15 Best Friend Truths, As Told By "Flight Of The Conchords"
thread.title_full: 15 Best Friend Truths, As Told By "Flight Of The Conchords"

author: Erin La Rosa
title: 15 Best Friend Truths, As Told By "Flight Of The Conchords"
text:
View this image ›
HBO ID: 10346830 2. Even when your friend is dating someone, you’re basically the third person in that relationship. View this image ›
HBO ID: 10346825 3. You have absolutely no problem telling your friend how smoking hot they are. View this image ›
HBO ID: 10346714 4. They always cut to the chase when it comes to questions. View this image ›
HBO ID: 10346859 5. And you’ve both made the best of not-so-great situations. View this image ›
HBO ID: 10346841 6. You’re never afraid of being brutally honest with your best friend. View this image ›
HBO / Via livinghappilyeverafter.tumblr.com ID: 10346692 7. Especially when it comes to what they’re wearing. View this image ›
HBO ID: 10346699 8. You’ve been known to get a little ~dramatic~ with each other. View this image ›
HBO ID: 10346710 9. And your friend always knows to give you a compliment when you need it most. View this image ›
HBO ID: 10346820 10. If you’re talking about sexy sex times, you know it’s gonna be with your BFF. View this image ›
HBO ID: 10346770 11. And you’ve definitely done a friend photoshoot at some point. View this image ›
HBO ID: 10346721 12. Basically you just always have each other’s backs. View this image ›
HBO ID: 10346737 13. You and your friend are the ultimate stone-cold weirdos with each other… View this image ›
HBO ID: 10346757 14. …but your weirdness helps you see the best in them. View this image ›
HBO ID: 10346832 15. And finally even though you can’t always be with each other, in your heart you basically are. View this image ›
HBO ID: 10346836 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
